content: Developed and launched internal large-language model chat website using React and Next.js.
Integrated site with OpenAI GPT-4, Google PaLM 2, and Meta Llama 2 models to support a variety of chat experiences.
Scaled AI chat Node.js backend to support 50,000 users and 5000 daily conversations.
Implemented file-based retrieval-augmented generation workflows to make LLMs aware of user-provided information.
Optimize page loading by statically rendering pages using React Server Components and streaming server-side rendering.
Created CI/CD pipeline using Google Cloud Build to test and deploy serverless applications.
Developed public API to provide low-cost access to LLMs within Ford.
Launched internal NLP platform using React to allow data scientists to index, search, and label natural-language text data.

Integrated NLP website with classification models to label data automatically and implemented active learning workflow to reduce the amount of manual labeling that was needed before a model could be trained.
Developed and deployed model catalog where users could publish models to be reused across common data formats.
Rewrote testing standards to increase confidence in code by making tests more closely reflect user behavior.
Collaborated with product owners to estimate, prioritize, and delegate user stories.
Created in-vehicle application in C++ to crowdsource road maps by collecting road feature data and uploading it to cloud.
Lead research team to provide recommendations on next-generation vehicle-to-cloud communication architecture.
Reduced on-vehicle script deployment time from 6 months to 1 month by developing script validation tooling.
Created error-tolerant Lua parser and editor extension, allowing script developers to receive code completion and diagnostics even when scripts are in a syntactically invalid state.
Created AWS Lambda Python package to automate the process of streaming DynamoDB data to an Elasticsearch index.
Computed worker analytics for the Mechanical Turk platform to identify low-performing workers, allowing users to gain insights into their batches and identify areas to reduce cost.
Created mobile application and REST API to provide faculty with rapid access to student records.
Reduced load time of internal pages by loading data asynchronously and compressing HTTP response bodies.

education.degree: Bacheleor of Science Engineering in Computer Science
